name: vaultls
description: VaulTLS is a self-hosted tool for managing TLS certificates via HashiCorp Vault, automating issuance and renewal for services through CLI commands and scripts.
features: Vault integration: Manage TLS certificates using HashiCorp Vault as the backend.
Automated issuance: Request and issue certificates automatically through Vault PKI.
Renewal automation: Automatically renew certificates before expiration to prevent outages.
CLI interface: Manage certificates through command-line tools for scripting and automation.
Certificate deployment: Deploy certificates to services automatically after issuance.
Multiple CAs: Support multiple certificate authorities and PKI backends.
Private PKI: Run your own private PKI infrastructure for internal services.
Certificate monitoring: Track certificate expiration dates and renewal status.
Scripting support: Integrate certificate management into deployment scripts and CI/CD.
Secure storage: Store private keys securely in Vault with access controls.
Audit logging: Track all certificate operations for compliance and security auditing.
Service integration: Integrate with common services and load balancers for automatic certificate updates.
